getaccountactivity.name: GetAccountActivity
getaccountactivity.description: Grants permission to get a specific activity record

getaccountplanstate.name: GetAccountPlanState
getaccountplanstate.description: Grants permission to get all of the information related to the state of the account plan related to Free Tier

getfreetieralertpreference.name: GetFreeTierAlertPreference
getfreetieralertpreference.description: Grants permission to get free tier alert preference (email address)

getfreetierusage.name: GetFreeTierUsage
getfreetierusage.description: Grants permission to get free tier usage limits and MTD usage status

listaccountactivities.name: ListAccountActivities
listaccountactivities.description: Grants permission to list available activities

putfreetieralertpreference.name: PutFreeTierAlertPreference
putfreetieralertpreference.description: Grants permission to set free tier alert preference (email address)

upgradeaccountplan.name: UpgradeAccountPlan
upgradeaccountplan.description: Grants permission to trigger an upgrade of account plan
